pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, November 18, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Arrivals at APEC Haus.

APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity  

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an APEC Leaders’ Official Photograph.

Outside Terrace, First Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the APEC Leaders' informal dialogue with Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund Christine Lagarde.

Closed to media.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Leaders’ Retreat.

Retreat Room, First Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity  

11:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe.

Bilateral Room, First Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting           

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Leaders’ Working Luncheon.

Closed to media.

2:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Australia Scott Morrison.

Bilateral Room 2, Ground Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Press Briefing Room, First Floor
International Media Centre

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media.
